p: Interestingly, asiaticoside has the advantage of not only promoting wound healing, but also normalizing cicatrization. It is one of the few natural compounds reducing keloid formation; in fact, it reduces the proliferation of keloid fibroblasts and the synthesis of type I and type III collagen in vitro [ 67]. The exact mechanism by which asiaticoside is able to reduce the proliferation of keloid fibroblasts, while it promotes the proliferation of normal fibroblasts is not yet understood, and further research is required to explain this paradoxical effect.‚Äù
